Desc.entry: Joan Newton offers a talk and demonstration on the art of pressed flowers (fee charged). Other subjects include: A Pressing Engagement in Japan - the story of a very unexpected visit to Japan (fee charged); To Romania With Love - the story of the WI's involvement with women's groups in Romania, a story with a happy ending (donations towards the work); The Medieval Saxon Villages of Transylania - unique, fragile and desperately in need of offical protection and sustainable development (donations towards the work).
